attr.text:
The Chinese company Chery is developing new products these days. One of these products is an all-electric chassis that will be introduced soon. To welcome this model, Chery has released some teasers, and carefully in these teasers, you can see that the latest Chinese electric car will most likely be placed in the mid-size SUV class, but due to the high price of mid-size electric cars and Lack of necessary infrastructure to charge electric cars, it is unlikely that we will see Chery's series of electric products in Iran in the near future.
